Protocols/MultiPeerDelegate.html#/s:9Mul.name: multiPeer(didReceiveData:ofType:)
Protocols/MultiPeerDelegate.html#/s:9Mul.abstract: didReceiveData: delegate runs on receiving data from another peer

Protocols/MultiPeerDelegate.html#/s:9Mul.name: multiPeer(connectedDevicesChanged:)
Protocols/MultiPeerDelegate.html#/s:9Mul.abstract: connectedDevicesChanged: delegate runs on connection/disconnection event in session

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: convert()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Unarchive data into an object and return as type Any.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toData(object:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Converts an object into Data using NSKeyedArchiver

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC8.name: delegate
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC8.abstract: Conforms to MultiPeerDelegate: Handles receiving data and changes in connections

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: connectionTimeout
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Amount of time to spend connecting before timeout

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC9.name: debugMode
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC9.abstract: Prints out all errors and status updates

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: initialize(serviceType:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Initializes the MultiPeer service with a serviceType and the default deviceName

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: initialize(serviceType:deviceName:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Initializes the MultiPeer service with a serviceType and a custom deviceName

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: startInviting()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: HOST: Automatically browses and invites all found devices

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: startAccepting()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: JOIN: Automatically advertises and accepts all invites

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: autoConnect()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: HOST and JOIN: Uses both advertising and browsing to connect.

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: stopAccepting()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Stops accepting invites and becomes invisible on the network

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: disconnect()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Disconnects from the current session and stops all searching activity

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC3.name: end()
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC3.abstract: Stops all invite/accept services, disconnects from the current session, and stops all searching activity

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.name: isConnected
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC1.abstract: Returns true if there are any connected peers

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC4.name: send(object:type:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC4.abstract: Sends an object (and type) to all connected peers.

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC4.name: send(data:type:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/s:9MultiPeerAAC4.abstract: Sends Data (and type) to all connected peers.

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.name: browser(_:foundPeer:withDiscoveryInfo:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.abstract: Found a peer, update the list of available peers

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.name: browser(_:lostPeer:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.abstract: Lost a peer, update the list of available peers

Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.name: session(_:peer:didChange:)
Classes/MultiPeer.html#/c:@CM@MultiPeer@.abstract: Peer changed state, update all connected peers and send new connection list to delegate connectedDevicesChanged
